DOC.brief_summary: This study explore potential next-day residual effect single even dose 3mg hypnotic , eszopiclone , 7.5mg zopiclone , placebo , healthy adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation Potential Next-day Residual Effects Eszopiclone Healthy Volunteers .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Healthy male female subject provide write informed consent . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Significant medical disorder ; Sleeping difficulty ; alcohol and/or substance abuse ; Recent use psychotropic medication , need use study ; Very high BMI low BMI bodyweight ; Known hypersensitivity study medication excipients ; Unwilling unable meet certain lifestyle dietary restriction study .
